backend/main.mo: Main backend canister managing user profiles with access control, Bible stories, verses, and admin‑restricted image uploads.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing feature evidence for deployment functionality and associated files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files for quick reference during build planning.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment guide outlining prerequisites and steps for building and publishing the app to the Internet Computer.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color tokens, themes, and base layout styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Frontend HTML entry point loading the React app and linking generated favicon assets.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with all site routes and wraps pages in a shared layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting first‑time authenticated users to save their display name with validation and async submission.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Top-level layout with header navigation, authentication UI, profile dialog, and footer surrounding all pages.
frontend/src/components/story/ImageUploa: UI component for admins to upload or replace story or verse images with validation and progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/story/PublicImag: Renders an ExternalBlob image URL and shows an error fallback if loading fails.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, logout, state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, stories, verses, admin status, and image uploads.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark theme colors, typography, and utility classes for app styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/DailyVersePage.tsx: Page that displays the daily verse with loading, error handling, and a refresh option.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page listing navigation cards linking to daily verses, stories, and testament pages.
frontend/src/pages/StoriesPage.tsx: Loads and displays a list of stories with loading and error states, allowing navigation to individual story detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/StoryDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a specific story, including image upload and verses, with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/TestamentPage.tsx: Fetches and lists verses from a selected testament with navigation to verse detail pages and full loading/error states.
frontend/src/pages/VerseDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed information for a specific verse, including optional image, with routing, loading, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for the frontend styling system.
project_state.json: Stores project versioning, architectural notes, feature list, and project summary for a Bible verses website. Acts as the project's state definition including planned features, admin rules, and known issues.
